info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-cfg
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG
     definitions for configuration of streaming telemetry.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2024 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

**Configuration Module**
**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-cfg`
**Paths:** 27

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-cfg structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-cfg.html)

get.description: MDT configuration data

put.description: Create or replace MDT configuration data

get.description: List of configured named protocol receivers.

put.description: Create or replace List of configured named protocol receivers.

patch.description: Partially modify List of configured named protocol receivers.

delete.description: Delete List of configured named protocol receivers.

get.description:
Configuration for receivers using a receiver type
           identified as 'protocol' in the subscription's
           rcvr-type field. (collection)

           rcvr-type field. (collection)

name.description:
The name of the receiver.
         Is a key to an entry in the named receivers list indicated
         by rcvr-type string of the parent subscription.

profile.description: Optional profile used by the receiver.

size.description: Maximum number of bytes per subscription

ca-tp.description: Trustpoint used to authenticate the server.

id-tp.description: Trustpoint that contains the client certificate.

field.description:
Subscription transform field name on
         which transform operation is performed

attr-type.description:
Transform input table attribute type
         e.g. table is mandatory for join record

onchange.description: Indicates that onchange filter is set.

check-with.description:
Specifies the kind of value
         this condition check should happen with.
         This way conditional operation can compare with either the
         user provided value or the previously cached value of
         the same field

window-size-type.description: Type of window size (eg. time, count based)

window-size.description: Window duration in case of time-based. Count in case of count-based

window-segment-type.description: Type of window segment (eg. sliding, tumbling etc)

lambda.description: Lambda (weight factor) used in Exponentially Weighted Moving Average calculation

operand-ref-type.description:
Specify whether the operand specified is a constant
         or a filed. If it is field, it's value shall be used
         in division operation

operand-role.description: Role of operand in division operation

operand.description:
Operand value to be used in division operation. It can be
         either a constant or name of another field

filter-id.description:
filters will be evaluated in sequence based
         on filter ID

next-lop.description: logical operation with next filter condition

operation-no-op.description: Indicates operation has not been specified. Value will be passed as-is

onchange.description: Indicates that onchange filter is set.

         this condition check should happen with.
         This way conditional operation can compare with either the
         user provided value or the previously cached value of
         the same field

operation-ewma.description: Data specifying Exponentially Weighted Moving Average parameters

operation-div-of-delta.description: Data specifying Division of Delta parameters

field-id.description:
Transform operation response field-id, part of response record.
         It is used to uniquely identify response record field

alert-data.description:
Transform alert data.
         It sets the alerting mechanism

fully-specify.description:
When fully-specify is set,
         fully-specify field identifier is sent
         in the response record along with field value
